statements: SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, medical_condition FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE medical_condition LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT patient_name, address, insurance_provider FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE medical_condition = 'Diabetes'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE insurance_provider = 'ABC Insurance' AND date_of_birth < '1990-01-01'
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE medical_condition != 'Healthy' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC
SELECT patient_name, medical_condition, insurance_provider FROM patients ORDER BY insurance_provider, date_of_birth DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_address FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Flu';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_specialty DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC, patient_dob ASC
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 3
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords INNER JOIN Doctors ON MedicalRecords.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id WHERE Doctors.doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology'
SELECT MAX(record_id) AS max_record_id FROM MedicalRecords
SELECT patient_name, treatment FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT physician_name, specialization FROM Physicians ORDER BY specialization DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, location FROM Appointments WHERE physician_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Physicians.specialization, Appointments.appointment_date FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id JOIN Physicians ON Appointments.physician_id = Physicians.physician_id;
SELECT physician_name, COUNT(*) AS appointment_count FROM Physicians JOIN Appointments ON Physicians.physician_id = Appointments.physician_id GROUP BY physician_name;
SELECT patient_name, address, appointment_date FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id WHERE address IS NOT NULL AND appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth <= '1990-01-01';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, status FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patients.first_name, patients.last_name, medical_records.date_of_service FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT doctors.first_name, doctors.last_name, appointments.appointment_date FROM doctors INNER JOIN appointments ON doctors.doctor_id = appointments.doctor_id WHERE appointments.status='Scheduled';

SELECT patients.first_name, patients.last_name, doctors.specialty FROM patients INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id INNER JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE hospital_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Hospitals ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT p.patient_name, d.doctor_name, a.appointment_date FROM Patients p INNER JOIN Appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id INNER JOIN Doctors d ON a.doctor_id = d.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM Hospitals WHERE capacity > 200 ORDER BY hospital_name ASC;

SELECT mr.record_id, p.patient_name, d.doctor_name, mr.diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords mr INNER JOIN Patients p ON mr.patient_id = p.patient_id INNER JOIN Doctors d ON mr.doctor_id = d.doctor_id ORDER BY mr.record_id DESC;
